entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High 12.
entry.summary: Rain ending early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with showers changing to 30 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High 12. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
